p: Identification of the chemical compounds in the EO responsible for antimicrobial activity is difficult, since the essential oils are complex mixtures with different chemical compounds that can act synergistically. 40, 41 A previous study has shown that the EO of C. nardus has greater antifungal activity against planktonic cells of Candida species than citronellal, which is its main chemical compound. This indicates a possible synergic action among the chemical compounds present in the EO. 10
